original_text: That priest himself may often do wrong things, because he is weak and human. As a result, he understands other people who make mistakes. He can be kind to people who do wrong things.
korean_text: 그가 무식하고 미혹된 자를 능히 용납할 수 있는 것은 자기도 연약에 휩싸여 있음이라

sentences.original_text: That priest himself may often do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그 제사장 자신도 종종 잘못된 일을 할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: because he is weak and human
As a result, he understands other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과로, 그는 다른 사람들을 이해합니다

sentences.original_text: He can be kind to people
